nodes.text: In 28 ABY, a dedication ceremony was held on Hosnian Prime, in honor of Senator Bail Organa, a founder of the Rebel Alliance. During the ceremony, a seventy-meter-high Jelucani fogstone statue of him, designed by Janyor of Bith, was revealed.

Senator Tai-Lin Garr and Princess Leia Organa, adopted daughter of Bail himself, both addressed the vast crowd of a thousand different species that had gathered for the occasion, reminding them of the sacrifices the galaxy made to restore the Republic. The ceremony was concluded with an air show, featuring a variety of sophisticated X-wing maneuvers.
